name: hUnGry HuNgrY ChicK
description:
Carlos the chick just hatched and is STARVING for some food! But he’s tired of the same food E V E R Y D A Y… Oh? What is that over there in the grass?

A CAKE??? Your stomach grumbles, your feet moves, and your heart screams for you to follow after this food trail!!

Help Carlos eat by following his stomach along this delicious trail of foods, dodging cars, people, and logs in the process! Exploring the world and what it has to offer as a newborn chick! Hungry Hungry Chick is a 3D platformer game, focused on collecting all the foods in each level in order to follow the trail and reach the end of it. 

   

FEATURES

– You may play as an adorable Chick!

– You can run away from home

– Eat all your “cheat” foods!!!!

– get run over by a car…COUGH

– get BIGGER, FATTER, and BETTER

– Run away from people or others!!

===========================================================

LEVEL LAYOUT/DESIGN by: Hari Jeung

===========================================================
